overview: JJ finds himself in an awkward situation whilst preparing for a hot date with a man he met online. After figuring out what's going on with JJ, Zuri and Ben manage to get JJ to face the reality of the situation. This short presents a South African slant to the way young gay men may think about PrEP and some of the unintentionally comedic challenges that can ensue.
title: After Party – Salmon Raw
